Material used.Material Name: Transgenic mice expressing human mutant α-syn
Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using conditional transgenic mice expressing human mutant α-syn in regionspecific expression.

Readout description.Result Description: Levels of dopamine in the olfactory bulb and brain stem nuclei were significantly lower compared to wild-type controls.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type α-syn expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Control mice without transgenic expression were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA for comparing dopamine levels across replicates.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Dopamine levels greater than 80% in the olfactory bulb and brain stem nuclei.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Dopamine levels less than 50% in the olfactory bulb and brain stem nuclei.
